MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH43 postcode area of Prenton, affecting ODD properties 1-45 and EVEN properties 26-40 Kindale Road. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1PM due to repairs needing to be carried out on the electrical cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:52AM on 7th March 2021.
